contest-event.event-date:
Nov. 16, 2002 D SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest (Second Section)
SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest (Second Section) 20 Test Piece Contest SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest sewbba-treorchy-contest-second-section
Blackfriars
Parc & Dare Theatre, Treorchy, Rhondda Cynon Taf, Wales, UK Best Instrumentalist: Glen Narbeth, euphonium, Ogmore Valley Prizes - 1st £150, 2nd £90, 3rd £60. 6 bands competed Second Section Champion Band of Wales: Markham and District Runners Up: RAF St. Athan
Aug. 12, 2015, 2:23 a.m. July 2, 2020, 12:09 p.m.
1 Markham and District Band Andrew Jones
2 Ogmore Valley Silver Band Ivor Barnett
3 RAF St. Athan Voluntary Band Alan Bourne
4 Cwmbran Band John Burns
5 Blaenavon Town Band Bryn Davies
6 Gwaun-cae-Gurwen Band Ron Williams
Withdrawn Ebbw Vale Band Ceri Thomas
